pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, March 17, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Greater Toronto Area, Ontario

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Kenya, Uhuru Kenyatta.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of France, Emmanuel Macron.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually participate in a panel discussion as part of the SHE Conference.

Closed to media

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local Persian business to highlight Nowruz.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister of Mental Health and Addictions and Associate Minister of Health, Carolyn Bennett, will visit a supervised consumption site and meet with workers and volunteers.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
